marklogic.body: The ultimate Liberial defense is to accuse their adversaries -- or their therapists -- of being cruel, Cold-hearted, unfeeling and it does absolutely no good to try to explain to them that their world-view is incomplete; that there is a time and a place for emotional response; that emotion must Always be tempered with intellectual clarity and rationality. But, penetrating that defense system becomes impossible when emotions and feelings become the mantra of Liberals when they group together. They become cultish, slaves to each other and the cacophony of the group drowns out the "still, small Voice" of Reason. I've come to the conclusion that Liberalism is a mental illness. What remains is for the next generation of Psychologists and Psychiatrists to classify it. I can't imagine that there would ever be a successful treatment for it.
